article_title: Need for free care continues despite Affordable Care Act
article_text:
1 million NC residents still lack health insurance

Patient visits as high as ever at free medical clinics

article_metadata.title: Need for free care continues despite Affordable Care Act | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: Alex Ming figures he’d be dead of a heart ailment if it weren’t for HealthReach Community Clinic.
